title: Border?
body: I was plat last season and I am not sure why I don't have it now ?

replies.body: I took a look at your account and it seems you were ineligible for Ranked 2016 rewards due to a suspension on your account towards the end of the season. If you'd like more context on this suspension or have any questions regarding it, please reach out in a [**support ticket.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
